entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • FixAllOccurrencesIgnoresGeneratedCode is flaky #56625
  • Calling interpolated string handler method on ref parameter (or ref local) causes compilation error #56624
  • Investigate lambda return type inference behavior for nested lambdas #56623
    17.0
  • Code fix for CS1591 to inherit documentation #56620
    Backlog
  • Compiler and IDE do not gracefully handle a generator being added twice #56619
    17.0
  • snippets do not expand for #region and #if #56618
  • Null ref in CommitSolutionUpdate #56617
    17.0
  • MessagePackSerializationException: Failed to serialize System.IO.Pipelines.PipeWriter value. #56613
  • [Coming Soon] Require .NET 6 RC1 SDK for Roslyn development #56612
  • Feature 'Navigate to' is currently unavailable due to an internal error #56607
    17.0
  • Do not show error CS0075 on non-ambiguous declarations #56604

Closed

  • Ambigious call in PLinq Aggregate method due to C#10 lambda type inference #56319
    17.0
  • .NET 6 RC 1: changes to overload resolution? Breaks NUnit? #56167
    17.0
  • MSBuild tasks should list the roslyn version #52265
    17.0
  • DiagnosticAnalyzer's Initialize method not getting called with VS 2019 upgrade #56449
    17.1
  • AdhocWorkspace.OpenDocument(documentId) causes parallel execution errors #56445
    17.0
  • Default XML comment for overriden properties/methods should be inherited. #54927
    Backlog
  • Syntax API for FileScopedNamespaces #54674
    17.0
  • Source generators: parallelize generation #42629
  • Make inheritdoc the default comment specification for interface implementation and override methods #56463
  • Inheritance margin navigation sometimes doesn't work #55791
    17.0
  • References not recognizing private fields #56496
  • Unable to set up editorconfig options like invert globally #56610
  • Compiler should allow assignment to discard - from ref-struct returning method. #39663
    17.0
  • "Sequence contains no elements" thrown from EmitSolutionUpdateAsync #56431
    17.0
  • Acquiring compilations when source generators are involved can significantly impact language features (i.e. completion) #55578
    17.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Update references for public 17.0 Preview 4 release #56626
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Avoid unnecessary up-front captures to temps while lowering indexer access that uses “Index Pattern” #56611
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Range
  • Provide quick info at #regionend showing #region message #56609
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Allow user to change the nuget.org feed name without breaking Nuget suggestions #56606
    Area-IDE
  • Handle operators when rewriting expression trees #56598
    Area-Compilers

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56622
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56621
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add missing releases to NuGet documentation #56546
    Area-Infrastructure, Documentation, Next
  • Avoid several breaking changes in overload resolution from inferred types of lambda expressions and method groups #56341
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.1-preview1 to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56602
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add support for all parenthesized binary additions of interpolated strings #56333
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56600
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56616
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Log gold bars to the activity log #56614
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56615
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add test to ensure completion won't trigger execution of source generator #56593
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Only move the focus back to editor for Inheritance Margin when ESC is pressed #56603
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enable async lightbulbs by default #56551
    Area-IDE
  • When "assigned", a `discard` doesn't escape out of the current expression. #56564
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.0 to main #56570
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Set CompilerApiVersion in Microsoft.Managed.Core.targets #56460
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix test #56605
    Area-Interactive, auto-merge, Next
  • Guard against updates with no type changes #56443
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix formatting of overload with new #56554
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56596
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56594
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Add more tests around case sensitivity and project reference conversion #56490
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56597
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56595
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.1-preview1 to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56630
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56629
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56628
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56627
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Report warning for implicit conversion of method group to object #56567
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.0
  • Do not include function type conversions in user-defined conversions #56416
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.0
  • Filter the directive trivia when code generation service try to reuse the syntax #56222
    Area-IDE
  • Clean up loc strings #56559
    Area-IDE
  • Fix #55183: Add SymbolVisitor<TArgument, TResult> #56530
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • StackTrace Explorer Implementation #56315
    Area-IDE
  • Fix crash lowering property pattern where override lacks a get accessor #56586
    Area-Compilers
  • Ensure we match equivalent paths when retrieving analyzer options in global configs #56588
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config, 17.0
  • Add completion tests for parameters in top-level statements #56385
    Area-IDE
  • Update to ICSharpCode.Decompiler 7.1.0.6543 #53304
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Inline Hints: Added double click on hint to insert text #55737
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Inline Parameter Hints
  • Add documents to PDB for types that have no methods with IL #56278
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix the condition on passing BuildWithSkipAnalyzers marker file to FUTD #56371
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Store information about special attributes in the decl table to avoid going back to source unnecessarily. #56402
    Area-Compilers
  • Delete ImmutableHashMap #31408
    Area-IDE, Concept-Continuous Improvement, Backlog
  • Add comment on usage of SLocalRegistry service on background thread #56591
    Area-IDE
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Community
  • Enforce nullability contract in lambda body #56590
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.0
  • Concurrency issue with fixed fields #56581
    Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • workspace.TryApplyChanges should respect changes to DefaultNamespace, and other project information #46021
    Area-IDE, Community
